sub_title: | Creative | Curious | Intuitive | Theoretical Physics | Math | Emeritus EIC Architect |
summary:
Herman was born in Ootmarsum, The Netherlands. 
At 21 years of age he graduated in Electrical and Computer Science.
Furthermore he holds a degree in Mathematics and Physics.

He now enjoys being retired at home spending his spare time Exploring Laws of Nature.

His Creativity, Curiosity and Intuition helps him to explore the Fundamental Laws of Nature.

His interests include Theoretical Physics, Quantum Mechanics, Astronomy, Relativity Theory, Particle Physics, Field Theory and Math.

He has a call and license from Dutch Government to transmit.

As Electrical, Instrumentation & Control Architect he has been involved at Projects for Royal Dutch Shell, Texas Instruments, Dow Chemical, U.S. Filter, Vivendi, Veolia, Electrabel, Polaroid Corporation, Urenco Netherlands, Wheelabrator, Akzo Nobel, Imtech, Royal BAM Group, Rossmark Watertreatment, RWB, Stork, Rabobank, Strukton, Powerspex, Vitens, Philips.

These Projects were mainly executed worldwide, like The Netherlands, Germany, China, Iraq, Algeria, Belgium.
